AboutMessage: This is the Restful API of the JsonSchemaValidator system
JsonFormatInvalid: The sent JSON is an invalid format to me.
ValidateKeyNotFoundInSchema: Informed key in object does not exist in schema.
ValidateSchemaIsFormatInvalid: Schema is not in a valid format.
ValidateTypeIsInvalid: Object data type does not match schema data type.
HttpNotFound: This service could not be found.
ParameterIsNotInformed: Expected parameters could not be found.
ParameterIsNotAObject: Parameter entered is not an object.
